item.title: Building a Light Display - Part 3
item.description: All the code and software can be found here. Planning out the controller We want to build an API that we can control the lights and host this locally. Then we are going to build iPhone shortcuts to control the lights. Having the API will allow us to control the lights independent of platform. Use gin to build the webserver Use rpi-ws281x-go to communicate with the lights.
